definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Among other sports that originate in Persia are polo and jousting.
sentences.chinese: 起源于波斯的其他体育项目还有马球和马上枪术。

sentences.english: Jousting Lists improve the quality of knights recruited here.
sentences.chinese: 枪术赛场提高城邑中骑兵部队的作战技巧。

sentences.english: I'm looking at you, jousting team.
sentences.chinese: 我看着你们呢，马上枪术队。

definition: Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
a kind of traditional Chinese sword-play
pose or motion of one's body in martial arts

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
